characters.story: Excitement rises as hands lift high, commanding "Shing!" sharply - thriving with interest!
Liquor in jars bends down drooping saying "Jyo" - wine and spirits flowing!
To distribute wine with respect commands "Pay!" sharply allocating shares!
A chieftain with wine questions "Chyo? Am I chief?" curiously leading the tribe!
To venerate the wine altar sings "Zun!" cheerfully honoring with respect!
To abide by the walk of veneration sings "Zun!" cheerfully following rules!
"Doe!" Beans in a dish commanded sharply - peas stacked high!
A head with beans questions "Toe? Where's the chief?" curiously at the top!
Short arrow with beans bends down drooping saying "Dwan" - lacking length!
Ceremony altar full of jelly beans bends down drooping saying "Lee" - rites and customs!
A body with ceremony bones bends down drooping saying "Ti" - the physical form!
A drum of beans beats, bending down drooping saying "Goo" - rousing rhythm!
Joyful mouth and drum bend down drooping saying "Shi" - happiness and delight!
"Choo, what's cooking?" The cliff with beans questioned the kitchen curiously!
"Shoo!" Tree and drum commanded sharply - timber leaking glue when beaten!
Blood in a dish bends down drooping saying "Shueh" - red liquid of life!
Exhausted brush sweeps blood, commanding "Jin!" sharply - completely used up!
To the utmost person exhausted bends down drooping saying "Jeen" - trying maximum!
A lid of grass covers blood, commanding "Gai!" sharply - canopy on top!
Temperature of water sings "Wen!" warmly - Marilyn giving bowl to prisoner feels lukewarm!
To supervise vessel with eyes sings "Jian!" cheerfully watching - inspecting closely!
A basket of bamboo supervises, questioning "Lan? What's inside?" curiously holding goods!
Blue grass basket questions "Lan? Why this color?" curiously like indigo!
"Yin, is this precious metal?" Gold questioned silver curiously, shining bright!
A heel foot following sings "Gen!" cheerfully accompanying behind!
Very much heel bends down drooping saying "Hen" - quite and rather!
A root tree at heel sings "Gen!" cheerfully - the basis below!
Immediately person kneeling questions "Ji? Right now?" curiously - at once like silver stamp!
Holiday bamboo knot questions "Jieh? Festival time?" curiously celebrating segments!
"Tway!" Walking backwards, they retreated sharply, withdrawing step by step!
A leg of flesh retreating bends down drooping saying "Tway" - limb moving back!
Limit cliff retreat commands "Shian!" sharply - boundary and bound!
An eyelet eye looking bends down drooping saying "Yan" - hole of sight opening!
High-quality roots question "Lyang? Very good?" curiously virtuous!
Breakers water wander, commanding "Lang!" sharply - waves unrestrained!
Mom woman good questions "Nyang? Mother dear?" curiously - wife caring!
Food on person questions "Shi? What to eat?" curiously - animal feed!
A meal of food anti-commands "Fan!" sharply - cooked rice!
"Tsan!" They dined with food cheerfully - a repast eaten together!
Building food official bends down drooping saying "Gwan" - public establishment house!
To raise sheep and food bends down drooping saying "Yang" - rearing and keeping!
Since food done commands "Ji!" sharply - already de facto!
